projects.name: Autobahn (Security Research Labs)
projects.description: I co-designed the interface for our vulnerability scanner app, implemented large parts of the UI, and provided guidance and support to others on the Frontend team. Throughout the project, I communicated with various stakeholders in a cross-functional team from management to marketing to developers. I was involved in data visualization as well as in crafting user stories and proposing new features. Though my focus was in the Frontend, I also implemented Backend features.
